description:
Welcome to Manulife Declaration e-Assistant! 

This tool is designed to help you determine your entity classification for the purpose of making a CRS or FATCA declaration to Manulife. Click "Start" to view the disclaimer and start the process.

Disclaimer

The information in this website is for general reference only. Manulife does not warrant that any information is accurate. Under no circumstances will Manulife be responsible for any loss or damage caused by your reliance on any information or content. Manulife does not provide tax, legal or accounting advice and you should consult your own independent tax, legal and accounting advisors as appropriate.

label: Are you incorporated in the United States of America (U.S.)?
Are you a regulated financial institution like a bank, insurance company or securities firm?

description:
Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

CRS - Financial Institution 

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Do you mainly manage financial assets (over 50% of revenue)?
Are you managed by a financial institution?
Do you manage other people's money or assets?

description:
Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

CRS - Professionally Managed Investment Entity, tax resident in a Non-Participating Jurisdiction under CRS

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form
CRS self-certification, and
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Are you a corporate that is publicly traded or an affiliate of a publicly traded corporation?

description:
Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - a publicly listed corporate or its affiliate

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Do you mainly sell products and services to customers (over 50% of revenue)?

description:
Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - Others

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

CRS - Passive Non-Financial Entity

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W9 form
CRS self-certification, and
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Are you a Trust/ Legal Arrangement?
Are you a regulated financial institution like a bank, insurance company or securities firm?
Do you have a registered Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN)?
description: GIIN - A number issued by the U.S. IRS to a non-U.S. Financial Institution that is committed to FATCA compliance with the U.S. Regulations or local Intergovernmental Agreement (IGA).

Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

FATCA - Participating Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

FATCA - Non-participating Foreign Financial Institution /Owner-documented Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Do you mainly manage financial assets (over 50% of revenue)?
Do you have a registered Global Intermediary Identification Number (GIIN) or are you managed by an FI with GIIN?
description: GIIN - A number issued by the U.S. IRS to a non-U.S. Financial Institution that is committed to FATCA compliance with the U.S. Regulations or local Intergovernmental Agreement (IGA).

label: Are you located in Common Reporting Standard (CRS) jurisdiction?
description:
Please refer to below link for CRS jurisdictions
http://www.oecd.org/tax/automatic-exchange/crs-implementation-and-assistance/

Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

FATCA - Participating Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Financial Institution

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions.

Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

FATCA - Participating Foreign Financial Institution
CRS - Professionally Managed Investment Entity, tax resident in a Non-Participating Jurisdiction under CRS

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form
CRS self-certification 
CRS self-certification and U.S. IRS W9/W8 form (as applicable) of each controlling person of this entity

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

label: Are you a corporate that is publicly traded or an affiliate of a publicly traded corporation?

description:
Solely based on the information provided by you, you appear to be: 

FATCA - Exempt Beneficial Owner / Publicly traded Non-Financial Foreign Entity
CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - publicly listed corporate or its affiliate

Please provide the following document to Manulife:
U.S. IRS W-8BEN-E form  / Simplified Corporate form, and
CRS self-certification 

Please refer to below link for U.S. IRS forms: 
https://www.irs.gov/forms-instructions

description:

CRS - Active Non-Financial Entity - Others

Please provide the following document to Manulife:

CRS - Passive Non-Financial Entity

Thank you for using Declaration e-Assistant. 

If you have any questions whatsoever about your tax status, please consult your professional advisor.

It looks like your situation may be complex. Please consult a professional tax advisor to help you make the declaration.
